channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bolt CEO says unlimited PTO is a 'totally broken' policy — so he killed it in favor of 4 mandatory paid weeks off
Boebert questions if US moon landing was real as bizarre ‘tin-foil hat’ interview goes off the rails
Germany launches additional measures against Russia's 'shadow fleet'
Man Dressed as Medieval Knight in Critical Condition After He's Stabbed Through 'His Visor' During Reenactment, Say Police
Gov. Newsom signs housing bill overhauling California's landmark environmental law
South Carolina deputy killed in what sheriff says was an ambush
item.description: A deputy has been killed in an ambush while attempting to arrest a suspect.

item.title: Ford Foundation selects Yale dean and democracy scholar Heather Gerken to succeed Darren Walker
item.description: The Ford Foundation has announced Yale Law School Dean Heather Gerken as its next president

item.title: US job openings in May hit 7.8M in a continuing display of labor market resilience

item.title: Televangelist Jimmy Swaggart, whose ministry was toppled by prostitution scandals, dies at 90
item.description: Jimmy Swaggart, the televangelist whose multimillion-dollar ministry was crippled by his encounters with prostitutes, has died
